page.title: 10Enviroment in Mabe
page.content: {Mabe}is a small village which joins on to{Penryn.}There is a new school being built at the edge of an estate called{ {Cunningham Park,}which is in the centre of the village.It is being built to replace the old church school which was built a long time ago.On land next to the school,the{Mabe Youth and{Community Project}planned to build a{Community Centre}for all age groups in the village.There is also in{Mabe}a large playing field and it has got two little swings and four big swings,a slide,a climbing frame,tyres for climbing on,a roundabout,a red rocking horse,a football pitch and a place behind the field were people go to make camps.
